channel.title: Jajang Irawan | UI & UX Designer
channel.description: My name is Jajang Irawan. I am UI & UX Designer for more than 3 years. I love coffee and Teh Tarik. I think a design means a lot to so many other things. First, good design will satisfy client. Then, an excellent design makes user easier to navigate the site. Moreover, satisfied users will bring more benefit to that siteâ€™s owner. All in all, a design can lead to huge success in so many ways, if it's done well.
